transArray.content: A newly opened hotel. I saw it when I was passing by. A friend from home stayed here. The feedback from my friend was very good. He said it was very clean, the room was very small, and the service at the front desk was also very good and very welcoming. , I also upgraded the room and got breakfast. Iâ€™m really satisfied.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
